column2: our server explained the menu and the ordering process
column3: as well as their sake social happy hour menu. Never being one to pass on a great deal
column4: we ordered all of the rolls on the happy hour menu
column5: the chef's catch of the day nigiri which happened to be blue fin toro
column6: the hot rock with waygu beef
column8: and the panna cotta for dessert. We also indulged in their $4 Sapporos and $7 glasses of rose. ‚Å£
